snippet.title: Memoirs of an Angel (2010) Story Trailer
snippet.description:
A new trailer for the original, 2010 version of "Memoirs of an Angel," a GxB fantasy-themed visual novel. Created to celebrate the official Steam release on July 30, 2024!

SYNOPSIS
Upon the death of the mighty Emperor Osirus, the nation of Tyraca is thrown into chaos. Its former princess, an angel named Zuleika, is now faced with a choice: will she bend to the authority of the new emperor, Osrirus' younger brother, Nefferon; or will she give up her title and leave her old life behind?

When a mysterious elven assassin shows up to take her life, she is forced to make a decision that will affect the fate of the kingdom. Regardless of what she chooses, the young angel's life will never be the same.

GET THE GAME
Itch (affiliate link): https://anigrams.itch.io/memoirs-of-an-angel-2010?ac=77VwXsKCbvG
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3072350/Memoirs_of_an_Angel_2010

MY LINKS
Website: https://anigramsproductions.com
Watch me play games: https://www.twitch.tv/anigrams

CREDITS
Music: "Eternal" by JDB Artist and "Sunny Village" by Murray Atkinson
